name: CreateAccountingConnection
description:
Establish or upgrade an accounting API connection.

Use this tool to set up a new accounting API connection or upgrade an existing Universal CSV connection to an API-based connection.

parameters.name: accounting_connection_name
parameters.description: The name of the accounting connection to establish or upgrade.

value_schema.description: The name of the accounting connection.

parameters.description: This argument is deprecated. Use POST accounting/connection/<connection_id>/reactivate instead.

parameters.description: The name of the accounting connection.
